```{r setup}
library(testthat)
library(jeksterslabRutils)
context("Test util_get_numbers.")
```


## Parameters


```{r parameters}
input <- util_rand_str(
  characters = 50L,
  digits = TRUE,
  ext = "inp"
)
knitr::kable(
  x = data.frame(
    Variable = "`input`",
    Description = "Input string.",
    Value = input
  ),
  row.names = FALSE
)
```


## Run test


```{r test}
results <- util_get_numbers(
  x = input
)
```


## Results

Note that only numbers should be retained.


```{r results}
knitr::kable(
  x = data.frame(
    Description = "Results.",
    Parameter = input,
    Result = as.vector(results)
  ),
  row.names = FALSE
)
```



```{r testthat, echo=TRUE}
test_that("util_cat_sys works", {
  expect_equivalent(
    is.numeric(results),
    TRUE
  )
})
```
